content: {"name": "Luv N Care Learning Center\t\t", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Coordinator: Sondra\tThompson\t6098935788\nStart: 06/30/2025\tEnd: 08/29/2025", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "530 Lakehurst Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Browns Mills", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08015", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9547747, "longitude": -74.5558618}, "phones": [{"number": "(732) 207-6308", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "10:30", "closes_at": "11:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "10:30", "closes_at": "11:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "10:30", "closes_at": "11:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "10:30", "closes_at": "11:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "10:30", "closes_at": "11:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Meals must be eaten on site."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "All children under 18 are eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Student Meal Site"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Summer Meal Program"}]}
